scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run env:setup
scripts.install:all: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build" "cd frontend && npm run build"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd backend && npm run lint" "cd frontend && npm run lint"
